meanings.sent1: The bathroom floor was retiled to make it look new.
meanings.sent2: They retiled the kitchen backsplash with colorful tiles.
meanings.sent3: After the cat tried to play with the tiles, they had to be retiled.
meanings.sent4: The artist retiled the mosaic of the sun, making it shine even brighter.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hammers retiled the roof, echoing through the house.

meanings.sent1: The workers retiled the patio to fix the broken tiles.
meanings.sent2: She retiled the fireplace to give it a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy chef dropped a pot, causing the need to retile the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: The gardener retiled the pathway, creating a new pattern of colors.
meanings.sent5: The rain retiled the sidewalk with shimmering droplets.
